sn2.4:1: At Sāvatthī. Standing to one side, the young deva Magadha addressed the Blessed One in verse:
sn2.4:2: v.59"How many sources of light are in the worldBy means of which the world is illumined?We’ve come to ask the Blessed One this:How are we to understand it?"
sn2.4:3: v.260"There are four sources of light in the world;A fifth one is not found here.The sun shines by day,The moon glows at night,
sn2.4:4: v.261And fire flares up here and thereBoth by day and at night.But the Buddha is the best of those that shine:He is the light unsurpassed."
